sourcesContent:
<!--
 Description: An button wrapper that applies common styling throughout the application

 Props: 
	type			Pass through the relevent button type for the native HTML 
					button. Useful with forms.
	form			Pass through the relevent form ID for the native HTML 
					button.
	deleteButton 	Apply unique red styling for delete buttons.
 Emits: 
 -->

<template>
	<button
		class="button"
		:class="{ 'delete-button': deleteButton }"
		:type="type"
		:form="form"
	>
		<slot />
	</button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	name: "Button",
	props: {
		type: String,
		form: String,
		deleteButton: {
			type: Boolean,
			default: false,
		},
	},
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.button {
	height: 2rem;
	padding: 0.5rem;
	padding-bottom: 2rem;
	margin: 0.3rem;
	border-radius: 5px;
	background-color: #3d6b56;
	color: #dce0d1;
	font-family: fell, serif;
	text-transform: lowercase;
	font-size: 1.25rem;
	cursor: pointer;
	transition: 0.5s;
}

.button:hover {
	color: #dce0d1;
	background-color: #bf763c;
	height: 2.1rem;
	transform: scalex(1.1);
	transition: 0.5s;
}

.delete-button {
	background-color: #770000;
}

.delete-button:hover {
	background-color: #770000;
}
</style>
